Follow news websites and social media accounts: Even if televisions disappeared, we can still keep up with the news by following reputable news websites and social media accounts. We can set up alerts and notifications to be notified of breaking news as it happens.
Listen to the radio: Radio is still a viable source of news, and we can tune in to local or national news channels to stay informed.
Read newspapers: While the internet has made newspapers obsolete for many, they still provide a comprehensive source of news. We can subscribe to a local or national newspaper to stay informed.
Join a news group: Joining a news group, such as a neighborhood watch or community organization, can provide us with local news and updates.
Attend news conferences: If we are really passionate about staying informed, we can attend news conferences or press events to get firsthand information from journalists and experts.
